full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal for Crating and Packaging Services for Sealift

### Reference Number
`5000061952 (R-4355-17064682)`

### Amendment Number
`1`

### Tender Status
Expired

### Notice Information

* [Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4355/5000061952-%28english.pdf) (English)
* [Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4355/5000061952-%28francais.pdf) (Francés)

### Contact Information
`Garvin Suepaul, Environment and Climate Change Canada`
* E-mail: [garvin.suepaul@ec.gc.ca](mailto:garvin.suepaul@ec.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 295-4823

### Description of Requirement

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has a requirement for packing and crating services for the annual arctic sealift resupply. The services will be required every calendar year during spring and summer for the next five years. The services will involve the design and manufacture of containers in treated wood, crate repair, and vacuum packaging of equipment parts.

The work consists of designing and manufacturing wood crates to contain various types of equipment, such as electronic parts, armament parts, mechanical parts, fuel and oil drums, piping, and other device components. Additionally, the required services include packing and crating services to be performed at ECCC facilities located in Burlington and Downsview, Ontario.

* GSIN Codes: N8145, N8115M, V504
* UNSPSC Code: 24112900 (Crates), 24140000 (Packing supplies), 78121500 (Packing), 78121502 (Crating services)

### Selection Criteria
The lowest price will be used as the selection criterion.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity

* Canada

### Regions of Delivery

* Burlington
* Toronto

Note
